text: The cost of dual-stain cytology used as a triage test was assumed to be equivalent to cytology as a triage test in the baseline.In the sensitivity analysis, we varied the performance of dual-stain cytology, considered a higher cost, and considered the impact of rescreening women 24 months after a negative dual-stain cytology result with a $70 \%$ compliance rate for returning instead of the base-case assumption of 12 months with a $90 \%$ compliance rate for returning.
